Lewis Gould, looking back again, voters cooled to the GOP.

Do you think that the party has completely shaken that?

I do think that it has tempered its image as the party of big business over the last 50 or 60 years, largely on cultural issues, so that somewhat incongruous or sometimes discordant parts of the country coexist with each other for different reasons.
